A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a phenomenal entry into the Star Wars universe that dared to challenge the expectations of fans\, delivering a film that reimagined the franchise whilst building on its most successful tropes. It was dramatic\, sinister and beautifully shot\, depicting a struggle between light and dark\, hope and hate that felt totally plausible and human whilst remaining true to the at times far fetched reality of the galaxy far far away.
